title: Biometric Access Request
description: SOP for biometric access requests and troubleshooting.

steps.title: Manager & HR Check
steps.instruction: Ensure you have manager approval and HR onboarding is completed with an active Employee ID.

steps.title: Physical Check
steps.instruction: Try cleaning your finger (ensure it's dry). Check if the device has power and if others are facing same issue.

steps.title: Prepare Ticket Details
steps.instruction: If still not working, prepare: Name, ID, Dept, Floor/Location, Type of Request, and Manager Approval info.

steps.title: Raise Support Ticket
steps.instruction: Raise a ticket at https://desicrew.freshservice.com with the details prepared in the previous step.
